alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 10:53AM CST until March 15 at 5:34AM CST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at Mount Carmel. Wabash River at Vincennes. Wabash River at Riverton. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Clinton. Wabash River at Terre Haute. Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. Wabash River at Montezuma. Wabash River at Covington. Wabash River at Lafayette. .Minor flooding is ongoing along the Wabash river and several tributaries due to 1.5 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding is ongoing along the full length of the Wabash River with the crest near Clinton. Flooding along many smaller tributaries that has not already ended will end by Tuesday. Flooding will continue through the end of the week and into next week on lower portion of the Wabash river. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY, MARCH 15... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until Wednesday, March 15. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Extensive flooding is in progress. Higher rural roads begin to flood. High water isolates many river cabins. Seep water becomes a problem. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Tuesday /11:00 AM EST Tuesday/ the stage was 19.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Tuesday /11:00 AM EST Tuesday/ was 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 19.9 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
